Texts.Eng: Excellent find, dear! This drone's database is saturated with useful information.
Find Clues to Locate the Apex Artifact
Hmm, this map indicates the supposed whereabouts of Big Ape. I see the Miniknog likes to keep its most important assets close to hand. I think this will be a very useful clue, dear.
I believe I know where the Apex Artifact is! ^#71f2f6;Come back to the Ark when you're ready^white; dear, and I'll tell you more.

I think we should begin our hunt for the ^orange;Apex artifact^reset;. The Apex are generally found on ^orange;frozen planets^reset; around ^orange;frozen stars^reset;, so those are ^green;the best places to search for the ^orange;clues^green; we need^reset;. Wrap up warm dear, and remember: Apex society is in upheaval at the moment, so be on your guard.
This doll is actually a spy camera... The Miniknog controls every aspect of Apex lives and culture. I'm going to attempt to trace this camera's signal... Thank you for finding this.
This is a useful find! I'm sure some of the information here pertains to the Artifact.
This newspaper clipping is full of trickery and propaganda, but I believe there is information of use hidden beneath the lies.
You're quite the collector of Apex antiquities! It appears you've already located enough clues to to allow me to identify the location of the Artifact!
You've found all the clues we need to locate the Apex artifact! This is brilliant, dear - we've come so far.
